name: Paul Johnston - trying to be civil (as a service)

content.html: On guns in the US, could you... Allow gun sales but restrict ammunition? It allows the bearing of arms. Ammunition can only be purchased for use on ranges. Personal use ammunition can only be sold in small quantities. It's enough for "protection" too. Let them have guns.
content.value:
On guns in the US, could you... Allow gun sales but restrict ammunition?

It allows the bearing of arms.

Ammunition can only be purchased for use on ranges.

Personal use ammunition can only be sold in small quantities. 

It's enough for "protection" too.

Let them have guns.
